channel.title: Changing Point Shop Prices
channel.description:
Im working on a server and ive just added some items into my point shop but i cant seem to change the price of them, For example i just added dragon claws into the shop and it says they are worth 0 Points and ive been in item.cfg and shops.cfg and changed the first 3 numbers but still nothing, ive searched point shop and looked on guides and everything and i just cant seem to find it :/ . If anyone knows why then please help me cause im really confused on how to do it :) Btw its a 317
Thank You.

item.title: Changing Point Shop Prices
item.dc:creator: @tdsmwh123 tdsmwh123
item.description:
@tdsmwh123 wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:5, topic:439078”]to change price of items buyable with something else than Coins, you have
to add these items ID in ShopAssistant.java.

you have to add this:

case ####: return ##;

“case ####:” = change the #### by your item ID.
“return ##;” = change the ## to the price you want.[/quote]

Thx alot man it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Point Shop Prices
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

to change price of items buyable with something else than Coins, you have
to add these items ID in ShopAssistant.java.

you have to add this:

case ####: return ##;

“case ####:” = change the #### by your item ID.
“return ##;” = change the ## to the price you want.

Read full topic

Go in item.cfg and change the first two numbers… there are alot of tutorials on this…
[/quote]

Ive looked at them but it still dosent work and i have changed the numbers and nothing :([/quote]

oh sorry i miss read you said point shop lol its in like shophandler.java
